TopicTitle: [VIDEO] Jeb lands on Kerbin aboard the Kerbohuz shuttle 9 ( Gravity mixup)

Articles.Content:
A mix-up from the end scene of the movie "Gravity", This is my first movie made in KSP, And i can tell you for a fact that my laptop hates this game, I may remake this in better quality / framerate (+120) when i repair my desktop

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9Yb2kHozfmI

Fact : Windows Movie Maker crashed 37 Times during the editing

Only using windows movie maker because laptop has nothing else, Must fix desktop!

Edited April 6, 2014 by Lewin225
Reason for windows movie maker
